title: Having issues Patching 6.15? Click Here!
body:
>#EDIT 8/1

>A Hotfix was successfully deployed that should have resolved the crashing at the Loading Screen due to the Patcher being pinned to the taskbar.

> If you are still experiencing crashes or Bug Splats at the Loading Screen, this is probably a different issue altogether.  Make sure to check out our[ Game Crash Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) for some solutions to resolve this!

---------------------------------------------------

>#EDIT 7/27 

>We've been tracking an issue with this patch where players who have the patcher pinned (instead of the desktop shortcut) to their Windows Task Bar consistently crash/Bug Splat when they attempt to get into a game after Champ Select.  We are working on a hotfix ASAP, but there is a temporary work around to get this solved:

>1. Un-pin League of Legends from your task bar. 
2. Use the patcher's "Repair" tool (click the question mark in the upper right-hand corner).
3. Launch League normally

>If this still doesn't work, you can also just [completely re-install League of Legends](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends)

>We'll update everyone once we get more info about the hotfix!

--------------------------------------------

Hey everyone,

From how the laning phase works to the technologically enhanced PROJECT skins that will be released sometime in the *future*. Behold the latest and greatest!!! Naturally, Katarina in usual fashion, just thinks she's PROJECT: Better than You. Typical.

http://i.imgur.com/OhZA7eq.gif

Let nothing stop you from experiencing this Brave New World, least of all patching issues!  If you have an issue, check the steps below that should move you past it and into the client!

----------------------------------------------

>#***Files Scanned reaches over 9000!!!!! Or, 15k, 20k, etc***

The patcher needs to scan already installed files to make sure that none of the files are corrupt.  If it finds one, it replaces it and rescans the files.  This is why it can sometimes get as high as 20k, even though there aren't 20k files in the installation.  

**The best thing to do is let it scan files!**  If you restart the client, it may cause it to scan even more files.   The patcher will eventually stop scanning files, and it will patch normally afterward.

>#***Patcher never pops up, or disappears after you press "LAUNCH"***

This can be caused by corruption with the patcher itself or it failed to properly self-patch. Additionally, it may be due to some issues with the configuration of your computer system's permissions (meaning it can't properly save the files in the correct location). To resolve this, make sure to complete all the steps in our [Patching Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)!

>#***Patcher stops/errors out at 33%, Patcher fails at 99%, or a general "Unspecified Error has occurred" message***

These are usually connection related errors. Either your computer is unable to maintain a stable connection, or a 3rd party security program is blocking League of Legends from properly patching. Many of the most common Anti-virus programs [have already whitelisted LoL](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3), however make sure to update yours to the latest version!

Also, even though you may have set specific exceptions in place before for your security program, League of Legends has gone through a major update. Therefore, your security program may recognize the old version of League of Legends, but not the new version. 

To get these issues resolved ASAP, make sure to go through our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)!

--------------------------------------------------------------

*If after completing these steps, and you still do not see the glorious orange 'LAUNCH' button, feel free to drop us a post in this thread!  Rioters as well as Wrenchmen volunteers will be on hand to respond and provide some additional help!*

replies.body: My game started crashing upon reaching loading screen into the match, after installing patch 6.15. Repaired the game thrice, currently re-installing.

> [{quoted}](name=Universal Scarf,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=PINB3ovq,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-26T09:23:42.300+0000)
>
> My game started crashing upon reaching loading screen into the match, after installing patch 6.15. Repaired the game thrice, currently re-installing.

Same with mine!!! Ive lost two games now because of this crash. Im not a happy camper right now? Should I uninstall as well?
that is not a connection trouble
I'm having the same issue. Tried literally everything with no success.

Just thought I'd say this (logged in just to say this).

I was experiencing the inability to load into games for the past three days.

I would connect to the client, champion select and everything just fine but when I try to load into the game, it would say unable to connect and to check my network. Considering that I've **never** had a problem like this before, I can only conclude that it was a result of this patch. I wasn't even able to load into CUSTOM GAMES.

However, I changed my computer's IP settings to a static IP address instead of an automatically acquired one and now I load into games successfully.

I really wish this didn't happen because now I'm stuck with leaverbuster strikes for leaving games that I was never able to connect to.

Try giving your computer a static IP address that's different from the one that you already have. It worked for me anyway.

Still extremely upset about the leaverbuster penalties though; I can't play with my friends because they don't have an extra 20 minutes to wait for me...

If you are on a mac, when the black screen comes up rapidly press space, enter, and/or delete.  Some times you may only need to smash just one of those keys.  Test what works for you with a custom game.  Riot has apparently known about this issue and this work around since patch 6.2.  This may not work for everyone but appears to work for many, myself included.

I just have a random update , I updated the game to Patch 6.15 yesterday , I've played about 5 games since then , and now I close my client during the loading screen , after opening it again , 150 MB download , I tried closing all LoL processes and restarting my PC , and now , 296 MB download , now I'm getting leaverbusted thanks Riot.

We noticed players that have League Of Legends pinned to their task bar have been crashing frequently. If you unpin it and run a repair before logging in it should fix you right up. You can run a repair by clicking the "?". If that doesn't stop the crashing it would be best to run a clean [Reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends)of the game.

After removing the pin and repairing the install it didn't work, so I tried reinstalling following the instructions posted there twice, the pvp.net patcher kernel continuously encountered errors and crashed both times. Any clue what I'm doing wrong?

EDIT: I've now tried reinstalling and removing absolutely every file possible and I'm still getting pvp.net patcher kernel errors.

UPDATE: By going into the installation file and opening lol.launcher.admin I appear to be getting somewhere finally. I currently have the patcher actually open and past its kernel error. I'll update this again if it works and I can actually get into a game.

UPDATE2: By running CCleaner, reinstalling, and going into the install file to run "lol.launcher.admin" I actually managed to get loaded into a custom game finally. I hope this helps if anyone else was having issues with the patcher kernel.

Well just tried again after the server maintenance and I still have the black screen of death after champion picks.  Whats up?  It is not my internet provider, administrator on my mac, Mac needing updating, etc.  Please fix this.  Currently there is a windows pc running LoL in my house about 10 feet away.  But LoL is not running on my mac.

My game has been crashing since patch 6.13, similar issue, client works, can do everything up to champ select. When the game goes to load though, it just crashes and the screen goes black. No bugsplat report either to send a report in. I'm on Mac and I've re-installed the game several times and just tried to repair it, nothing has worked yet.

> [{quoted}](name=Aerox80,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=PINB3ovq,comment-id=0077,timestamp=2016-07-31T19:15:36.792+0000)

No bugsplat report either to send a report in. I'm on Mac and I've re-installed the game several times and just tried to repair it, nothing has worked yet.

Same problem, but i'm on Windows.

Well, I was just blown off.  Riot is blaming my internet provider.  The Windows pc (on the same network) works fine with LoL.  It is my mac that has problems but never did before the 6.15 update.  There was a problem in that update.  Nothing concerning my internet changed nor anything on my mac.  Only change was 6.15 update.  I'm very disappointed and angry.

So I didn't have too much of a problem with 6.15 but then I got ANOTHER patch this morning and as soon as I started it my first game in it crashes without fail, my champ will start loading but no one else will and then it crashes. Please help
Can you tell us more info? When your game stopped working, were there any error messages like "X stopped responding" or bugsplats that popped up? The more info we have, the more we can help. :)
Something like "the game has crashed, please reconnect"

Let's try going through [the Crashing KB](http://riot.com/1SB1JXQ) then to start, make sure that there are no problems like corruptions, or driver errors that are causing it to not function properly.

You can also try Repairing the Client from the Launcher in the "?" menu to make sure to remove any corruptions with the client. :)

WHY NO PROJECT SKINS YET LAAAAD ITS BEEN 3 DAYS OR MORE. No its ok. Take ur time peeps. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Im just saying the problem with the crash thing before entering a game has made me so annoyed...
so far i have had 3 normal games that chrashed and couldnt re enter (on 2 different accounts).
i have tried to restart the computer many times as well as repatchig the newest update 6.15 atleast 5 times.
i even went and reinstalled the game 3 times as of now but even that hasnt fixed the problem (like wtf how come reinstaling didnt fix my problem?!?).

I mean i cant even play the game.
i tried to make play the tutorials to check if it had begun to work again but so far it still doesnt work.
i mean what do i do?
i just want to play :(
{{item:3070}} {{champion:32}}

HI there EinnerStein, sorry to hear about your hard time, but I might be able to find out what's up!

If you can get back to me about any error messages you had, such as "X is not responding" or bugsplat pop ups that would really help me. The more information I have, the more likely I can give you the right help. :)

In the meantime, let's try running through our [Crash and Bugsplat KB](http://riot.com/1Fa5J8l) here for some initial help. Let me know if these steps find any problems and help prevent future crashes from happening, or if they don't and you encounter similar problems. As you test your game play, stick to Customs though, that way if you do crash, you won't get hit with Leaver penalties. ^^

i have the same problem i did the same thing nothing works 

the only thing i can tell after champion select the screen go black after 1 min or less it said (unable to connect to the server pls check your internet connection )
 i cecked my net it working fine no problem pls help

I'm not happy.  I have reinstalled LOL and still crashes when loading into the match.  Showing as a leaver on two games.  I don't leave games.  trying the repair now.  Should I even try a game after repair?

Hey Susuth

You should always be careful logging in and playing games in the wake of a wide spread incident, Leaverbuster still punishes players for leaving games regardless of the reason; it's still gonna leave a few people a man down. 

Always try out fixes in a custom game first to make sure that they're working ok. If something goes wrong during the match and you're forced to close out, Leaverbuster won't trigger in a Custom game, and you'll be safe to keep playing and keep trying solutions.

After the repair are you playing ok now? No other problems?

> [{quoted}](name=DatFatRaccoon,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=PINB3ovq,comment-id=002d0003,timestamp=2016-07-28T15:49:47.495+0000)

> 
> After the repair are you playing ok now? No other problems?

Still not working on my mac.  have reinstalled, repaired, updated and repaired today.  Crashes when loading a game ( only doing custom games now).

Let's get in touch with our Tech team then; they'll likely have ways to help out with whatever is causing the problem and go in depth to root out the issue.

[Follow this link](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) here to ask your questions and they'll see whether it's a Mac issue or something else!

Hi! uh i contacted riots support team and they told me to send them a log from the hextech repair tool, i sent it about 2 days ago but still havent gotten a reply, i havent played league ever since the patch, is it normal to have to wait days?
It can take days in rare cases to receive a response from tech help, but it doesn't happen often. Do you have the Ticket ID for your request so we can check it and see what's up?

Rineyy has a good tip there! Custom games are great for testing since they will keep you from getting further LeaverBusters. Just make sure you're in there with only bots. If you're still crashing after a [repair ](http://riot.com/1eoyIyI)and a [reinstall](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) go ahead and [send in a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). We'll help you out!

When i Updated it I had no patching problem's and now after the patching got finished i finally started to go a custom and try the new patch that just got updated.

Finally I repaired the game if there could have been some patching problems and i repaired it more like a 5 times and when i go in game after champ select i am still getting BUGSPLAT error. 
I don't know what to do now.
and NOW Riot has been aware of the problem now.
So i really need help from riot wasted more than a DAY for this. 
PLS RIOT i need my league of legends game back where they where no ERRORS.
PLEASE FIX THE PROBLEM :)
Thank You Everyone.   :){{champion:157}}

Hey JUGGERNAUT12345, 

We were tracking an issue with players who had League pinned to their task bar and were crashing. You can fix this a couple different ways.

 If you unpin League from your task bar and run a repair before logging in by clicking the "?" it can resolve the issue. If that doesn't help running a clean [Reinstall](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) can also annihilate the issue. 

If you still have issues after trying either of these reach back out to me.
Still have the same problem after all that :'(
My patcher continually gets stuck on 33% my wifi is decent and I have no problems with my security what else could it be?
HEYYYY!! Patcher worked!! Only took 2000 files too!! Well done riot! League of life on!!

so my patcher freezes at 32% and an error pops up. i went through the checklist provided, updated all my anit-virus stuff, deleated and redownloaded league. submitted tickets to riot. this has been happening for two days. i am very upset about this. can someone help me out.
fixed. it. my . damn. self.
Everything seems to have patched, but I can't find any of the new project skins. The loading screen is also still ryze.
The Project skins have not been activated yet.

Anywhere between Thursday 28th July and Tuesday 2nd August, 2016.
Ok thanks, i just thought it would be coming today or tmo.
